name: EIFFEL TOWER
description: The Eiffel Tower is a wrought-iron lattice tower on the Champ de Mars in Paris.

name: TOWER BRIDGE
description: Tower Bridge is a Grade I listed combined bascule and suspension bridge in London.

name: SIDNEY OPERA HOUSE
description: The Sydney Opera House is a multi-venue performing arts centre in Sydney.

name: LONDON EYE
description: The London Eye, or the Millennium Wheel, is a cantilevered observation.

name: THE PANTHEON
description: The Pantheon from Greek Πάνθειον Pantheion, is a former Roman temple.

name: SPACE NEEDLE
description: The Space Needle is an observation tower in Seattle, Washington, United States.
